content.query:
SELECT dep, SUM(salary) as totalSalary 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://abhisheksynapsedlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedemo/employees.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
) AS [result]
GROUP BY dep


SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://abhisheksynapsedlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedemo/employees.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
) AS [result]
